trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell 指令程式

trans-unit.source: Disable-PSBreakpoint
trans-unit.target: Disable-PSBreakpoint

trans-unit.source: Disable-PSBreakpoint
trans-unit.target: Disable-PSBreakpoint

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 概要

trans-unit.source: Disables the breakpoints in the current console.
trans-unit.target: 在目前的主控台中停用中斷點。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 語法

trans-unit.source: Breakpoint (Default)
trans-unit.target: 中斷點 （預設值）

trans-unit.source: Id
trans-unit.target: Id

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The **Disable-PSBreakpoint** cmdlet disables breakpoints, which assures that they are not hit when the script runs.
trans-unit.target: **Disable-psbreakpoint** cmdlet 會停用中斷點，以確保，它們不會叫用指令碼自動執行。

trans-unit.source: You can use it to disable all breakpoints, or you can specify breakpoints by submitting breakpoint objects or breakpoint IDs.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用它來停用所有中斷點，或是藉由送出中斷點物件或中斷點識別碼來指定中斷點。

trans-unit.source: Technically, this cmdlet changes the value of the Enabled property of a breakpoint object to False.
trans-unit.target: 就技術上來說，這個 Cmdlet 會將中斷點物件的 Enabled 屬性值變更為 False。

trans-unit.source: To re-enable a breakpoint, use the Enable-PSBreakpoint cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 如果要重新啟用中斷點，請使用 Enable-PSBreakpoint Cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: Breakpoints are enabled by default when you create them by using the Set-PSBreakpoint cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Set-PSBreakpoint Cmdlet 來建立中斷點時，中斷點預設會處於已啟用狀態。

trans-unit.source: A breakpoint is a point in a script where execution stops temporarily so that you can examine the instructions in the script.
trans-unit.target: 中斷點是指令碼中的暫時停止執行點，用來讓您檢查指令碼中的指示。

trans-unit.source: **Disable-PSBreakpoint** is one of several cmdlets designed for debugging Windows PowerShell scripts.
trans-unit.target: **Disable-psbreakpoint** 是設計用以偵錯 Windows PowerShell 指令碼的數個指令程式的其中一個。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the Windows PowerShell debugger, see about_Debuggers.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 Windows PowerShell 偵錯工具的詳細資訊，請參閱 about_Debuggers。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: Example 1: Set a breakpoint and disable it
trans-unit.target: 範例 1︰ 設定中斷點，並將它停用

trans-unit.source: These commands disable a newly-created breakpoint.
trans-unit.target: 這些命令會停用新建的中斷點。

trans-unit.source: The first command uses the Set-PSBreakpoint cmdlet to create a breakpoint on the *Name* variable in the Sample.ps1 script.
trans-unit.target: 第一個命令使用 Set-psbreakpoint cmdlet 上建立中斷點 *名稱* 在 Sample.ps1 指令碼變數。

trans-unit.source: Then, it saves the breakpoint object in the $B variable.
trans-unit.target: 然後，它會將中斷點物件儲存在 $B 變數。

trans-unit.source: The second command uses the **Disable-PSBreakpoint** cmdlet to disable the new breakpoint.
trans-unit.target: 第二個命令會使用 **Disable-psbreakpoint** cmdlet 來停用新的中斷點。

trans-unit.source: It uses a pipeline operator (|) to send the breakpoint object in $B to the **Disable-PSBreakpoint** cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 它用於管線運算子 (|) 將中斷點物件傳送中 $B **Disable-psbreakpoint** 指令程式。

trans-unit.source: As a result of this command, the value of the Enabled property of the breakpoint object in $B is False.
trans-unit.target: 此命令的結果中 $B 中斷點物件的 Enabled 屬性的值為 False。

trans-unit.source: Example 2: Disable a breakpoint
trans-unit.target: 範例 2︰ 停用中斷點

trans-unit.source: This command disables the breakpoint with breakpoint ID 0.
trans-unit.target: 此命令停用具有中斷點識別碼 0 的中斷點。

trans-unit.source: Example 3: Create a disabled breakpoint
trans-unit.target: 範例 3︰ 建立已停用的中斷點

trans-unit.source: This command creates a new breakpoint that is disabled until you enable it.
trans-unit.target: 此命令建立新的中斷點，在您啟用之前它會是停用的。

trans-unit.source: It uses the **Disable-PSBreakpoint** cmdlet to disable the breakpoint.
trans-unit.target: 它會使用 **Disable-psbreakpoint** cmdlet 來停用中斷點。

trans-unit.source: The value of the *Breakpoint* parameter is a Set-PSBreakpoint command that sets a new breakpoint, generates a breakpoint object, and saves the object in the $B variable.
trans-unit.target: 值 *中斷點* 參數是設定新中斷點、 產生中斷點物件，並將物件儲存在 $B 變數中的 Set-psbreakpoint 命令。

trans-unit.source: Cmdlet parameters that take objects as their values can accept a variable that contains the object or a command that gets or generates the object.
trans-unit.target: 以物件為其值的 Cmdlet 參數可接受包含物件的變數，或是取得或產生物件的命令。

trans-unit.source: In this case, because **Set-PSBreakpoint** generates a breakpoint object, it can be used as the value of the *Breakpoint* parameter.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，因為 **Set-psbreakpoint** 產生中斷點物件的值作為 *中斷點* 參數。

trans-unit.source: The second command displays the breakpoint object in the value of the $B variable.
trans-unit.target: 第二個命令會顯示 $B 變數的值中的中斷點物件。

trans-unit.source: Example 4: Disable all breakpoints in the current console
trans-unit.target: 範例 4︰ 停用目前主控台中的所有中斷點

trans-unit.source: This command disables all breakpoints in the current console.
trans-unit.target: 此命令停用目前主控台中的所有中斷點。

trans-unit.source: You can abbreviate this command as: "gbp | dbp".
trans-unit.target: 您可以將此命令為縮寫:"gbp |dbp"。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 參數

trans-unit.source: -Breakpoint
trans-unit.target: 中斷點

trans-unit.source: Specifies the breakpoints to disable.
trans-unit.target: 指定要停用的中斷點。

trans-unit.source: Enter a variable that contains breakpoint objects or a command that gets breakpoint objects, such as a Get-PSBreakpoint command.
trans-unit.target: 請輸入包含中斷點物件的變數，或可取得中斷點物件的命令，例如 Get-PSBreakpoint 命令。

trans-unit.source: You can also pipe breakpoint objects to the **Disable-PSBreakpoint** cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用管線中斷點物件 **Disable-psbreakpoint** 指令程式。

trans-unit.source: -Confirm
trans-unit.target: -Confirm

trans-unit.source: Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 會提示您進行確認，然後再執行此指令程式。會提示您進行確認，然後再執行此指令程式。

trans-unit.source: -Id
trans-unit.target: 識別碼

trans-unit.source: Specifies an array of IDs or variables that contains the breakpoint IDs.
trans-unit.target: 指定識別碼或變數的陣列，其中包含中斷點的識別碼。

trans-unit.source: You cannot pipe IDs to **Disable-PSBreakpoint**.
trans-unit.target: 您無法透過管道傳送識別碼 **Disable-psbreakpoint**。

trans-unit.source: -PassThru
trans-unit.target: -PassThru

trans-unit.source: Returns an object representing the item with which you are working.
trans-unit.target: 傳回代表您正在使用之項目的物件。

trans-unit.source: By default, this cmdlet does not generate any output.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，此 Cmdlet 不會產生任何輸出。

trans-unit.source: -WhatIf
trans-unit.target: -WhatIf

trans-unit.source: Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 顯示執行 Cmdlet 後會發生的情況。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 無法執行此指令程式。顯示執行此指令程式會發生什麼事。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.
trans-unit.target: 未執行 Cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 這個 cmdlet 支援一般參數:-偵錯、-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 以及-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸入

trans-unit.source: System.Management.Automation.Breakpoint
trans-unit.target: System.Management.Automation.Breakpoint

trans-unit.source: You can pipe a breakpoint object to **Disable-PSBreakpoint**.
trans-unit.target: 若要將中斷點物件可以透過管道傳送 **Disable-psbreakpoint**。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸出

trans-unit.source: None or System.Management.Automation.Breakpoint
trans-unit.target: 無或 System.Management.Automation.Breakpoint

trans-unit.source: When you use the *PassThru* parameter, **Disable-PSBreakpoint** returns an object that represents the disabled breakpoint.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用 *PassThru* 參數， **Disable-psbreakpoint** 傳回物件，表示已停用的中斷點。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this cmdlet does not generate any output.
trans-unit.target: 否則，此 Cmdlet 不會產生任何輸出。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 附註

trans-unit.target: 相關的連結

trans-unit.target: Get-PSCallStack

trans-unit.target: Remove-PSBreakpoint
